onyomiExamples.meaning: on the road, on the street, in the street, on the way
alley, alleyway, lane, bare earth (i.e. ground not covered by a roof), open field, outdoors (non-greenhouse cultivation of crops), teahouse garden, path through a gate (or through a garden, etc.)
means of survival, means of escape, way out of a difficulty

kunyomiExamples.meaning: road, path, street, lane, passage, route, way, distance, journey, road (e.g. to victory), course, way (of living, proper conduct, etc.), moral principles, teachings (esp. Confucian or Buddhist), dogma, field (e.g. of medicine), subject, speciality, means, way, method
tiger beetle (esp. the Japanese tiger beetle, Cicindela japonica)
side road, byroad, digression (e.g. from argument)
